title: El Desayuno
subtitle: Breakfast
meta_desc: Learn breakfast vocabulary in Spanish with audio pronunciation. Ages 2-5.
keywords: learn Spanish preschool, Spanish food book, breakfast Spanish, bilingual children books

pages.title: El Desayuno
pages.prompt: A beautiful breakfast table with pancakes, fruit, juice, and eggs, warm morning light through window, professional food photography, landscape orientation, wide 16:9 format, high resolution.

pages.title: Los huevos son amarillos.

pages.title: El pan es delicioso.

pages.title: La leche es blanca.
pages.prompt: A glass of fresh white milk next to colorful cereal bowl, morning kitchen scene, professional food photography, landscape orientation, wide 16:9 format, high resolution.

pages.title: La fruta es dulce.

pages.title: El jugo es de naranja.
